div.p:
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xj die
marcij

the saide day the widew of patrik Wis' allegit scho hede
tak of ane croft for foure yeris of Androw murray and offerit
hir to preiwe hir' tak one monunday that next cumis befor
the aldirman and balyeis quhilk day thai assignit to hir preiwe

the xviij day of marche the yer' forsaid It was ordanit
be the aldirman ballieis and consale that thar' salbe gevin
to our Souerane In propin In wyne j pip of patow iiij li'
x s' xij li' skorcheatis xxxvj s' In wax v petir price v li'
Summa xij li' And' xl s' In wax wyne and spice to the'
erle of bothuale to be takin of thar' commone gudis
of the malis of the Witsonday terme to cum safar' as It
will extend to

the said day the aldirman ande thir personis of Consale vndir writin
sere Jonhne ruthirfurd Robert blinsel Dauid menyeis Johne Cullane
Alexander Rede thomas prat Johne Colisone Dauid mathesone Androw branche Jhon Wormet
Williame blinsele patrik leslie William Kintor mathow branche
george byssat Jonhne Retre and diuers' vthiris present for the tyme
grantit that Alexander menyeis suld' haue the landis of bogferloghe'
In tak al the dais of his lywe for foure markis of maile
eftir the tenouris of the ak maid' tharapon' obefor and ordanit the common'
Sele to be gevin him tharapon And chesit Jonhne Colisone thomas
prat Jonhne Wormet Dauid mathesone and William gareauche Wormet commissoris
to Sett the said tak et cetera as said is et cetera

The saide day It was statut ande ordanit be the aldirman balyeis
counsal ande part of the communite that the personis quhilkis Inquietis
the toune be summonce bill' of complant or ony vthir wais of perse
secucion Sal neuir Jois' nor bruk takis of fischingis nor landis
of the tone al the dais of thar lywez'

xxj die marcij quo supra Actio debatibilis mota per andream lintone contra Alexandrum prat et Andream
hall penes bona Jure'e' overwrites 'r'. sibi hereditario contingen' cum consensu parcium continuatur vsque ad proximam
curiam legalem post pascha sub Spe concordie
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxjo die marcij quo Supra

Eodem die decisio plegij porrecti per Willelmum blinsel super Symonem
gardin continuatur vsque in feriam quintam proximo futuro cum consensu parcium propter debilitatem
Curie
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxvjo die marcij quo Supra

the saide day the aldirman and balyeis grantit that Dauid mathesone hede
gevin at thar command to our Souerane lord xxix quartis of maluasie
price pait xiiij d' summe lx thre pundis Sevin s' and viij d' Ande thre
li' of Skorcheatis price ix s' the haill some thre li' xvj s' et viij d'
quhilkis salbe allouit in the said Dauidis wattir maile of this Instant
yer

The saide day Robert Cullane offerit him redy to vndirlie the decisione
of ane assis' of the best and worthiest of the tone vnsuspect in ale
thingis that Jonhne Steuart had to opppone agannis him and the said Johne
refusit and wald' nocht consent to abid' at the declaracion of ony assis'

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiudem xxviijo
die marcij Anno Domini millesimo quadringentesimo Nonagesimo Sexto

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis grantit thame resauit
fra mathow branche tene pundis of Skorcheatis gevin to our
Souerane lordis propin quhilkis costis xxxtj s' and allouit in
his wattir maile of this Instant' yere

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis'
Jonhne Colisone forspekar that Androw branche is avand
xiiij s' to William gareauche of the rest of ltj s' of fraucht
Item It was deliuerit that the saide Androw is awand' to
the saide Williame xxviij s' g' et vj g' for the quhilkis
he sal pay thre pundis Scottis money for the punde
gretis And' the said Androw was quyt of ij pety quartaris
of Salt follouit be the said Williame the said' Somes
pait be Androw branche In presence of the aldirman

Curia Capitalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
vndecimo die mensis Aprilis Anno Domini millesimo quadringentesimo nonagesimo sexto

Eodem die thomas prat protestatus fuit pro octo barrellis salmonum pro piscaria
Sexte partis de crovis si ipse Jus ad eandem habuerit et eadem occupata
fuerit per thomam hay elenam muresone aut suos subtennentes

The saide day the ballieis assignit this day xv dais gif it be lauchfule
and falyeing tharof the next lauchfule day thareftir follouing to Alexander beuerlay ansuer to the
borghe' Strekit one him be thomas hatmakar for the wranguis' haldin
fra him of cownt Rekning and pament of iijC lamskinnis ijc lenterinwar'
and ij ottir Skinnis to be warit in lynt and wax in the Erast Schip cumand'
out of Danskin to Abirdene as in the borghe' gevin to the said Alexandris forspekar
Robert Cullane tharapon mair' fullie is contenit and the said Robert come souerte
for the entiring of the said' Alexander to the saide day

Eodem die Agnes andirsone concessit et promisit ad presentandum suam litteram coniuncte infeo
dacionis coram preposito et ballivis huius burgi in pretorio eiusdem infra xxtj dies penes terram
quam nunc Inhabitat pro clameo Johannis Kintor filij suj

Eodem die Robertus glenmaluyn fatebatur se debens Andree lammyntone nouem
francos et dimidium quatuor marcas quinque s' et iiij d' Soluend' infra vigintj dies sine vlteriore
dilacione

the saide day the balyeis this day xv dais assignit to Dauid mar'
to bring his b previs and documentis quhilkis he has and will vys' anent
the clamys movit be him agane Jonhne low eftir the tenor' of our
Souerane lordis lettres present to thame tharapone and ordanit the officiaris to pas'
and warne thame to the saide day And' atour thai warnit and chargit Jonhne
low to comper the saide day to ansuer' to the saide Dauid in the said'
thingis And gif that day be nocht lauchful to comper the next lauchful day
thareftir follouing

The saide day Alexander horne tuk to preiwe one monunday that next
cumis befor the aldirman and balyeis that the money clamit be him
in his bill gevin to the kingis hienes one sere Jonhne ruthirfurd
was his avne money

Eodem die assignatur patricio clerk hodie ad quindenam
responsurus plegio super eum porrecto per Relictam Johannis Stevinsone
pro iniusta detencione ab ea vnius corrigie argentie

Eodem die accedens ad barram dominus patricius ramsay vnius capellanorum
hospitalis Sancti petrj de Abirdene et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo
Redditu d' sibi et dicto hospitali annuatim debito de quadam terra vasta infra
dictum burgum in vico furcarum ex occidentali parte eiusdem vici inter terram Johannis Culane
ex australi et terram Johannis Colisone ex boreali ad quam accedentem nichil reperit
distringible preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentavit in Curia tanquam
secundo die processus Testibus Andrea Sthevinsone et Roberto Ouchtirles' ac henrico
orvm serieando

Eodem die Accedens ad barram magister Walterus skaw capellanus perpetuus de
morphy et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo redditu xiij s' et iiija d'
sibi annuatim debito de quadam terra vasta Jacente infra dictum burgum in le futy inter
terram Willelmi litster' ex australi et terram Johannis reide carnificis ex boreali
cum cauda extendenti ad le linkis Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile
preter terram et lapides quos ballivis In sacculo presentavit in Curia tanquam secundo
die huius processus An Testibus Andrea Jonhnsone Johanne sclugy et henrico
orvm sergeando

Eodem die venerabilis vir magister Duncanus scherar canonicus Abirdonensis ac patronus altaris
beati Andree apostoli infra ecclesiam cathedralem Abirdonensis situati fecit constituit et ordinauit
magistrum laurencium pyot dominos Willelmum mureson Curatum matheum nicholsone Willelmum
crukschank suos procuratores legittimos ad prosequendum quandam terram Jacentem in le hukstarraw inter
terram Willelmi nicholsone ex occidentali et terram Robertj evinsone ex orientali secundum legittimos processus
dicti burgi pro annuo Redditu duarum marcarum eidem altarj annuatim debito promitten' de
Rato et grato

Eodem die accedens ad barram discretus vir magister laurencius pyot procurator venerabilis
virj magistri Duncanj scherar' canonicj Abirdonensis patronis altaris beati Andree apostoli
Infra ecclesiam cathedralem Abirdonensis situati et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno
annuo Redditu duarum marcarum debito annuatim sibi et dicti altarj de quadam terra
penitus vasta Jacente infra dictum burgum in le hukstarraw inter terram Roberti
evinsone ex orientali et terram Willelmi nicholsone ex occidentali ad quam terram
accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos ballivis in
Sacculo presentavit in Curia tanquam primo die huius processus Testibus
Johanne thomsone Willelmo vmfra et Andrea nachtj seriando

Eodem die accedens ad barram dominus Willelmus crukschank capellanus ac procurator
altaris Sancti Duthacci infra ecclesiam parochialem beati Nicholaij de Abirdene situati
et protestatus fuit in forma Juris pro vno annuo Redditu quinque s' sibi et dicti
altarj annuatim debito de quadam terra vasta Jacente in vico superioris ecclesie ex
australi parte eiusdem vici inter terram thome prat ex orientali et terram
thome mar' ex australi Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter
terram et lapides quos ballivis in Sacculo presentavit tanquam primo die huius processus
testibus patricio grig fergusio Wattirman et Jacobo leis' seriando

Eodem die perlectis tribus processibus per dominum andream henrici capellanum ac procuratorem altaris
beati Nicholaij de Abirdene deductis de et super recuperacione proprietatis et possessionis
Cuius terre vaste Jacentis in vico furcarum ex occidentali parte eiusdem vici inter terram
Johannis Cullane ex australi ex vna et terram Johannis Colisone ex boreali partibus
ab altera in defectu solucionis vnius annuj redditus trium solidorum a longo
tempore debito et non soluit vnde dictus dominus andreas henricj per suum
procuratorem et prelocutorem dominum Alexandrum club peciit a ballivis secundum formam suj processus
precedentis Juris et Justicie complementum Et porrexit plegium in manu
philippj Dunbrek seriandi quod ipse proprietatem et possessionem dicte terre legittime recuperavit in
defectu solucionis dicti annuj redditus Tunc Curia mature auisiata decreuit quod dictus
dominus Andreas proprietatem et possessionem dicte terre legittime recuperauit in defectu solucionis dicti annuj
Redditus Et hoc ex ore Johannis Williamsone Judicatoris curie pro Judicio
datum fuit Teste Curia

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xv die mensis
aprilis quo Supra

Eodem die Dauid galichtlie legittimus premunitus vocatus non comparuit
ad respondendum plegio super ipsum alias per Andream lammyngtone porrecto
pro iniusta detencione duorum le guthtlingis pro vno vnicorne Impigne
rant Igitur precipitur henrico Orvm seriando ad capiendum districtum ab
eo et pren eundem ad plegium dimittj si petatur et ipsum ad diem
lune ad quindenam premunire tanquam secundo die huius processus

Eodem die continuatur decisio plegij per thomam hatmakar porrecti super
Alexandrum beuerlay continuatur vsque in diem lune proximo futuro per assisam Et
Robertus Culane deuenit plegium pro Introitu dicti Alexandri

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xviijo
die mensis aprilis quo supra

head.add: plegij legales Inter dominum Johannem ruthirfurd' et Andream gilberti menyes et cetera

div.p:
Eodem die Alexander Rede deuenit plegius legalis quod gilbertus menyeis
Andreas branche thomas Waus Ricardus Waus et Alexander horne erunt Indempnes
pro Johanne ruthirfurd milite aliter quam per viam Juris Et gilbert Alexander menyes
deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus miles erit Indempnis pro gilberto menyeis
et richardo Waus aliter quam per viam Juris Jacobus Colisone deuenit plegius
legalis quod dictus miles erit Indempnis pro Andrea branche et thoma Waus
aliter quam per viam Juris gilbertus menyeis deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus miles
erit Indempnis pro Alexandro horne aliter quam per viam Juris Item Alexander menyeis
deuenit plegius legalis quod Adam ruthirfurdfurd erit Indempnis pro gilberto menyeis et Ricardo
Waus Jacobus Colisone devenit plegius legalis quod Idem Adam erit Indempnis pro
Andrea branche et thoma Waus et gilbertus menyeis pro Alexandro horne aliter quam per viam
Juris Et Johannes ruthirfurd devenit plegius legalis quod dicte persone erunt Indempnes pro dicto Ada
aliter quam per viam Juris Et quelibet dictarum parcium obligatur ad conseruendum conseruandum plegios suos
Indempnes de huiusmodi fideiussione

the said day the balyeis assignit this day xv dais to philp clerk to ansuer
to the borghe' strekit one him be Jonhne Scott for the wranguis' haldin
fra him of jc lameskinnis iij ferlotis of Salt and ij li' hemp he gevand' him
x s'
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxij die aprilis quo supra

The saide day the borghe' strekit be thomas hatmakar one Alexander beuerlay
that he wrangit in the haldin of his bill of compt Rekning and pament of iijc
lamskinnis and ijc futuale and tua Ottir Skinnis was fundin of nayne
availe be ane Suorne assis' Jonhne Culane forspekar for the quhilkis
the said thomas was in ane amerciament of the court Ande the saide Alexander
quyt of his challance of the said gudis

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Jonhne Culane forspekar
that Alexander Crag wrangis in the making of band contrar' the commone profit
that nay craftisman Skinnar of this burghe sulde fee seruandis but leif
of thar dekin and the craft for the quhilkis he was in ane Amerciament of the
court and to amend as law will and to forber' in tym to cum

The said day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Jonhne Culane forspekar
that Alexander Crag Skinnar wrangit in the persevin and follouing of henry
bavne befor the Speciale Juge in the Ciuile actionis pertening to his aldirman
and balyeis his Juge ordinar refusing to persew Justice befor tham to quhom
the Jursidiction' of Sic thingis pertenis and to Amend as law wil and forber' in
tyme to Cum

Eodem die Malcomus crag deuenit plegius legalis quod henricus bavne
erit Indempnis pro Alexandro Crag aliter quam per viam Andreas branche
deuenit plegius quod Idem henricus erit Indempnis pro patricio Dons' aliter
quam per viam Juris Et thomas prat deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus Alexander
et patricius erunt Indempnes pro dicto henrico aliter quam per viam Juris
Et quelibet parcium obligatur ad conseruandum suos plegios Indempnes
de huiusmodi fideiussione

Curia ballliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxvj die
aprilis quo Supra

Eodem die actio mota Inter Dauid mar' et Johannem low cum consensu
parcium continuatur vsque in pennultimum diem aprilis Instantis sub spe concordie
absque preiudicio parcium

Quinto die maij quo supra Compertum fuit per Inquisicionem quod
Willelmus Robertsone est filius et propinquior heres quondam Johannis
Robertsone Igitur datum fuit in mandatis thome leslie balliui ad
cognoscendum ipsum ad terras Jacentes infra dictum burgum

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem sexto die mensis
maij quo Supra

The saide day Androw litstar' in the gallougate was conuikit be
ane Suorne assis' Androw branche forspekar' for the deforcing
of Androw nachtj officiar' in the execucion of th his office and to amend'
as law will and forber' in tyme to Cum

The said day Androw litstar oblist him be his hand vphaldin and fatht of his
bodie to stand at the ordinance of the Counsal present for the tyme for the
offence committit in the ak obefor Immediatlie quhilkis riplie auisit
ordanit the said Androw to pay xl s' to Robert huchosone Sangstar
In part of pament of his for aucht to him

The saide day the aldirman with avis' of the counsal chargit Androw
litstar to forbeir' merchandice or his craft of litstarry and vys' bot
ane craft vndir the pane of law And to cheis ane of the said
craftis quhilkis he will vys' and to gif his ansuer' tharapone
this day viij dais to the tone
